title: Clinic & Specialty Center & Pharmacy
description: The Clinic & Specialty Center is a specialty care center, providing a wide range of medical care in one location.
cleaned_text: Clinic & Specialty Center Our Clinic & Specialty Center brings you 26 primary and specialty care clinics under one roof, providing a wide range of medical care in one convenient location. In addition, advanced diagnostic and imaging services, cancer center, rehabilitation services, pharmacy, and surgery make the Clinic & Specialty Center a full-service healthcare destination. Our providers are leaders in research and clinical care, serving you with compassion and expertise. The fact that they are all located in one building means they can collaborate on your care much more easily, leading to a better medical outcome for you. Clinic & Specialty Center Pharmacy Located on Level 1 Hours of operation: 8:00 am to 6:00 pm M-F 9:00 am to 4:30 pm Saturday Phone: [612-873-6600](tel:612-873-6600) This pharmacy has a [medication disposal bin](https://www.hennepinhealthcare.org/medicine-disposal-bins/). Proper medicine disposal is important to avoid misuse and environmental harm. Primary Care Providing the highest quality, most comprehensive primary care medicine is an important part of keeping our patients healthy. Several clinics within the Clinic & Specialty Center offer primary care services. If needed, providers in primary care clinics work in collaboration with other specialists and departments within the Clinic & Specialty Center to help patients with complex conditions. Specialty Care Hennepin Healthcare is known for providing patients with specialty care expertise. With many specialty clinics under one roof, we also provide added convenience for patients to see highly skilled providers, resulting in better patient care and outcomes. [Integrative Health](https://www.hennepinhealthcare.org/specialty/integrative-health-clinic-parkside/) Parking Ramps Handicap accessible and discounted patient parking are available at the following ramps: [HCMC Parking Ramp](https://www.google.com/maps/place/South+6th+St+%26+Park+Ave,+Minneapolis,+MN+55415/@44.9738152,-93.2640781,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b3329fc782e4d9:0xa139dd416c9f9e78!8m2!3d44.9738152!4d-93.2618894), 6th Street and Park Avenue [Hospital Parking Ramp](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Chicago+Ave+%26+S+8th+St,+Minneapolis,+MN+55404/@44.9713156,-93.2643529,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b332a0398c475d:0x37a91659b90f3ace!8m2!3d44.9713156!4d-93.2621642), 8th Street and Chicago Avenue [Clinic & Specialty Center](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Park+Ave+%26+S+8th+St,+Minneapolis,+MN+55404/@44.9718911,-93.2657134,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b332a1d74af39d:0x3adc40fc0deb3bd0!8m2!3d44.9718873!4d-93.2635194), Park Avenue between 8th Street and 9th Street
